name: Professional Business Website
description: Complete website for service businesses and consultants
longDescription: Launch your business online with a professional website built for conversions. Includes contact forms, service pages, testimonials, and appointment booking integration.
features: 5-7 custom pages (Home, About, Services, Contact, etc.)

name: E-Commerce Store
description: Full online store with payments, inventory, and order management
longDescription: Sell products online with a complete e-commerce solution. Stripe payments, product catalog, shopping cart, order tracking, and customer accounts all included.

name: Appointment Booking Platform
description: Client scheduling system with calendar sync and payment collection
longDescription: Let clients book appointments directly on your website. Includes calendar integration, automated reminders, payment collection, and availability management.

name: Custom Development Consultation
description: 1-hour strategy call to scope your project and tech needs
longDescription: Not sure what you need? Book a consultation to discuss your business goals, technical requirements, and get a custom proposal. Includes follow-up documentation and cost estimate.
